Package de.matthiasfisch.mysticlight4j

Class MysticLight4j

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.matthiasfisch.mysticlight4j.MysticLight4j
  • public class MysticLight4j
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class for accessing Mystic Light devices and LEDs in an object oriented manner. The available devices can be retrieved with getAllAvailableDevices() and the LEDs of these devices can be accessed via these objects. If you don't want to use the OOP interface, you can directly access the Mystic Light SDK API functions via the MysticLightAPI JNI interface.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MysticLight4j

        public MysticLight4j()
        Initializes a new MysticLight4j instance initializing the native API if necessary. This constructor throws IllegalStateException if the JVM process is not running with administrator privileges as these are required to access the mystic light API.
        Throws:
        MysticLightAPIException - Thrown if initialization of the native API fails.

      • MysticLight4j

        public MysticLight4j​(@NonNull
                     @NonNull java.nio.file.Path dllPath)
        Initializes a new MysticLight4j instance initializing the native API if necessary.
        Parameters:
        dllPath - The path to the native DLL for the system architecture or to a directory containing this file.

      • MysticLight4j

        public MysticLight4j​(boolean requireElevatedPrivileges,
                     @NonNull
                     @NonNull java.nio.file.Path dllPath)
        Initializes a new MysticLight4j instance initializing the native API if necessary.
        Parameters:
        requireElevatedPrivileges - Whether to enforce elevated privileges.
        dllPath - The path to the native DLL for the system architecture or to a directory containing this file.
        Throws:
        MysticLightAPIException - Thrown if initialization of the native API fails.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllAvailableDevices

        public java.util.List<Device> getAllAvailableDevices()
        Returns:
        Returns all accessible Mystic Light devices.
